articles.title: NASA to Discuss Status of Artemis I Test, Launch - NASA
articles.description: NASA will hold a media teleconference at 3:30 p.m. EDT Thursday, May 5, to discuss the status of the next wet dress rehearsal test of the agency’s Space Launch System (SLS) rocket and Orion spacecraft at the agency’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida.

articles.title: Eta Aquarids meteor shower will peak on Friday - with up to 50 shooting stars visible every hour - Daily Mail
articles.description: According to Royal Observatory Greenwich, the Eta Aquariid meteor shower will peak between midnight and dawn on Friday (May 6).
articles.content:
Up to 50 shooting stars per hour will light up the night sky when the Eta Aquarids meteor shower reaches its peak later this week.
